body_html: Hey @ramonh. I believe the reason why User#email is not required is because users can be added as part of a team just by their github handle. At that stage, we don't know anything about the user yet and can't require an email. It should be a requirement for the ApplicationDraft instance though.

body: Hey @ramonh. I believe the reason why User#email is not required is because users can be added as part of a team just by their github handle.
